p: Eggs of the two species of nematodes were extracted from tomato ( Solanum lycopersicum cv. Belladona) roots, using the hypochlorite method [ 29]. The suspension of eggs was placed on a 38 μm sieve, thoroughly rinsed with tap water and collected into a 100 mL beaker. The quantification of eggs suspension was done using an inverted microscope (100×), and the adjusted suspension was used directly in the bioassays.
